comprehensive_overview: gdb4hpc is a plugin designed to enhance the GNU Debugger (GDB) for High Performance Computing (HPC) applications. It provides additional features to aid in debugging parallel and distributed applications typically used in HPC environments.
core_features: Some core features of gdb4hpc include advanced debugging capabilities for parallel and distributed applications, support for various HPC programming models such as MPI and OpenMP, improved performance analysis tools, integration with common HPC development environments, and enhanced visualization of parallel program execution.
